Meats I have eaten

Feb 10, 2008

Just to be contrarian (see my last post), here is a list of meats that I have eaten.

  • Beef
  • Pork
  • Lamb
  • Chicken
  • Turkey
  • Duck
  • Pigeon
  • Spatchcock
  • Goat
  • Rabbit
  • Pigeon
  • Crocodile
  • Kangaroo
  • Emu
  • Camel
  • Reindeer
  • Moose
  • Wild Boar
  • Your standard assortment of fish and crustaceans
  • Scallops
  • Oysters
  • Abalone
  • Sea Urchin (tastes like the sea just exploded into your mouth)
  • Eel

p. Update

p. So, I totally forgot my trip to South Africa:

  • Kudu
  • Eland
  • Impala
  • Ostrich
  • Buffalo
  • and whatever they put into boervors

p. More Updates

p. Rosemary reminded me about the frog legs I ate in French class one year. So …

  • Frog Legs
